DOC.criteria: Over 18 year age . Have least one decay back tooth need crown Study tooth upper low premolar molar tooth/ teeth Study tooth vital asymptomatic start study Teeth non vital , root canal treatment Teeth pulp cap Sensitive teeth Significant untreated dental disease include periodontitis rampant decay Pregnant lactate woman Patients allergy material use study Unable attend recall appointment
